Hydras:

"That's sound fun" hissed Hydras
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Novem=
ber 24, 2007 11:50 AM
  Subject: Re: G2


  ::Scorponok::

  Scorponok: If =
the city is under attack and Rodimus is distracted it might be easier to ge=
t his wife. We would have to wait untill after the situation is cleared up =
to actually bait Rodimus.

  Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote=
:

    > Hydras:
    > 
    > "Be careful to not show personality faults"hi=
ssed Hydras "As far as
    > the femme named Nightlight is in your grasp le=
ave the base and we
    > have to do a little exchange, the clone tht would=
 be the bait would
    > be here and the true one will go to our new base. =
With the clone we
    > can ambush Rodimus here and maybe we could have som=
e fun"
    >
    > ::Jhiaxus/Hevng::
    > 
    > Jhiaxus rested back in th=
e chair he was in and allowed his thoughts
    > to control the puppet.
   =
 > 
    > Hevng took the equipment and transformed to beast mode. The beast=
 bot
    > exited the Predacon base heading for Atlantis.

    Myrmidon nod=
ded as he listend to the interchange between this puppet
    and Hydras. He=
 tilted his head as he thought carefully. "I thought I
    heard someone me=
ntion that Atlantis is under siege. If Rodimus is
    injured, will he come=
 after his wife, or will he send someone else?"

    Myrmidon shrugged at h=
is own statement, curious how this subterfuge
    would turn out. He sat ba=
ck, and along with Hydras, he simply waited
    for it all to unfold.

    =
Preston
    (Myrmidon)
